short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will give you the current weather in your area.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension always user to get the current weather in their current location. It uses you longitude and latitude to find out were you are. Then it uses a 3rd part service to get the current weather based on you position. This extension will give you the current precipitation, wind speed and other weather data based on your current location.
